SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.model.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.model.game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents an entire Game play. It has a minimum number of player of two and a maximum number of player of four. To play more than one game, more instances of game have to be created
See Also:
